review_body: A decent barcode reader app, and I appreciate the lack of spam, but why bother with this app when there are others that offer the 'pro' features for free?
Very fast and ads free..... Most appropriated
Everything is there but the option to scan a photo saved in the mobile is not there. which is a very important feature. waiting for 1.1.0 update... Don't know when will it come?
Took an awful long time to scan a QR code, but if the scanned code is longer than the screen is wide, it doesn't wrap, so you can't read it.
Hi dev. I see the tab create qr location code a little bit complicated. I see "Long Lat". It should open a map & let you point your finger to a place you want
Best I've found, but the ability to share a text from a different application and send to this app would be a great convenience
first time i open it after update didn't pick up qr code off of laptop screen but now looks like it does work. great that it has no ads
I just love the app.. it's really doing an awesome job. Very fast and less Ads..üëç
awesome, didnt know you could use qr code to share so many types of info.
Add more options in vcard / contact like an organization, job title, website and geolocation.
The app has some bug problems, So please solve that problem then this app will be the best app.
That's a good app This helps me to do any online works Really it's fantastic app
Simple with no ads
the best qr code reader ever
This app is so good. I use many QR scanners before and i felt difficulty with them but this one is the best i didn't find any error or fault.
It's easily scan doesn't crash and it's free QR reader or scanner. Very user friendly. Great Job..
This QR code reader is very easy ro understand and use. Thankyou . Keep up the good work
Best app.

This is an amazing app. Easy to use and no complications. If you are looking for an easy to use QR scanner , you are in the right place.
